title: Google\Cloud\BareMetalSolution\V2\NfsShare\AllowedClient
name: AllowedClient
description:
Represents an 'access point' for the share.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.baremetalsolution.v2.NfsShare.AllowedClient

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.network
params.description: The network the access point sits on.

params.name: data.share_ip
params.description: The IP address of the share on this network.

params.name: data.allowed_clients_cidr
params.description: The subnet of IP addresses permitted to access the share.

params.name: data.allow_dev
params.description: Allow dev flag. Which controls whether to allow creation of devices.

params.name: data.no_root_squash
params.description: Disable root squashing, which is a feature of NFS. Root squash is a special mapping of the remote superuser (root) identity when using identity authentication.
